patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,50 @@
 <form [formGroup]="addressForm" novalidate (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">
-  <mat-card class="shipping-card">
+  <!-- product-order.component.html -->
+
+<mat-card>
+  <mat-card-header>
+    <mat-card-title>Product Order</mat-card-title>
+  </mat-card-header>
+
+  <mat-card-content>
+
+    <!-- Product Dropdown with Search -->
+    <mat-form-field>
+      <mat-label>Select Product</mat-label>
+      <mat-select [(ngModel)]="selectedProduct" placeholder="Search for a product" [formControl]="productControl">
+        <mat-option *ngFor="let product of filteredProducts" [value]="product">
+          {{ product.name }}
+        </mat-option>
+      </mat-select>
+    </mat-form-field>
+
+    <!-- Quantity Input -->
+    <mat-form-field>
+      <mat-label>Quantity</mat-label>
+      <input matInput type="number" [(ngModel)]="quantity" min="1">
+    </mat-form-field>
+
+    <!-- Payment Method Dropdown -->
+    <mat-form-field>
+      <mat-label>Select Payment Method</mat-label>
+      <mat-select [(ngModel)]="selectedPaymentMethod">
+        <mat-option *ngFor="let method of paymentMethods" [value]="method">
+          {{ method }}
+        </mat-option>
+      </mat-select>
+    </mat-form-field>
+
+  </mat-card-content>
+
+  <mat-card-actions>
+    <!-- Add your order submission button or logic here -->
+    <button mat-raised-button color="primary" (click)="onSubmit()">Submit</button>
+  </mat-card-actions>
+
+</mat-card>
+
+  <!-- <mat-card class="shipping-card">
     <mat-card-header>
       <mat-card-title>New Order</mat-card-title>
     </mat-card-header>
     <mat-card-content>
@@ -94,6 +138,6 @@
     </mat-card-content>
     <mat-card-actions>
       <button mat-raised-button color="primary" type="submit">Submit</button>
     </mat-card-actions>
-  </mat-card>
+  </mat-card> -->
 </form>

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
New Order
@if (addressForm.controls['firstName'].hasError('required')) { First name is required }
@if (addressForm.controls['lastName'].hasError('required')) { Last name is required }
@if (addressForm.controls['address'].hasError('required')) { Address is required }
@if (hasUnitNumber) { } @else { }
@if (addressForm.controls['city'].hasError('required')) { City is required }
@for (state of states; track state) { {{ state.name }} } @if (addressForm.controls['state'].hasError('required')) { State is required }
{{postalCode.value.length}} / 5
Free Shipping Priority Shipping Next Day Shipping
